description: API to get logistics packaging information for calculating commission

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify user permission to use this API

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Request if needed to call to trace

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight of the packaging in centimeters

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the packaging in centimeters

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The length of the packaging in centimeters

parameters.name: packaging_fee
parameters.description: The packaging fee size or cost aspects level

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Error code if any error. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Error message if any error. Empty if no error
